review: I gave this to my teenage son as a gift and he and his brother love it.  They said they would give it 6 stars if they could.  We have DISH as well as access to Netflix and Hulu.  We have been able to avoid putting extra satellite receivers in the house because of the Amazon Fire Stick.  One of my sons is a senior in high school and is looking forward to taking it to college.  Great little device, easy to use.

review: Easy to set up, but it gets confusing distinguishing between the tv and firestick and which controls to use.  Took a while to figure out how  to search and find stuff.  Oh, and I thought that having Prime gave you access to all movies, but you have to rent them like any other service.  Other than that, nice remote and great idea for  alternate TV
